description:
Join us at [The Golden Guinea in Bristol](https://thegoldenguinea.co.uk/function-room/) for a South West Ruby meetup featuring:

💬 talks by [Miles Woodroofe](https://mileswoodroffe.com/) (Mindful Chef) and [Karl Entwistle](https://x.com/karlentwistle?lang=en) (BiggerPockets)

**Schedule**

18:00 - Arrive, grab a drink from the bar, have a chat

18:45 - **"Getting Started with Solid Queue - The new default ActiveJob backend for Rails 8**" **-** Miles Woodroofe

Amongst many other things, Miles is CTO at [Mindful Chef](https://www.mindfulchef.com/) and [Rails Foundation](https://rubyonrails.org/foundation) board member.

19:15 **\- "SyntaxTree And Me " \-** Karl Entwistle

Join Karl for a brief introduction to the amazing [SyntaxTree gem](https://github.com/ruby-syntax-tree/syntax_tree)! He'll share two practical examples of how it helped him solve real-world problems quickly and effortlessly—without relying on a single regex.

Karl is a Senior Application Engineer at Bigger Pockets.

19:45 - 21:00 - More mingling

**Slack**

If you'd like to join us on Slack please join [Bristol & Bath Ruby Slack](https://join.slack.com/t/bath-and-bristol-ruby/shared_invite/zt-1gnf6q40k-GfPoQThrqCj8AHq0wA4_qg) and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
title: South West Ruby #44
